title: TEDxAuckland 2016 FoodStory
description:
Food. It’s an essential ingredient to life, growing ideas, people and #TEDxAkl. Check out our Food Video from last years Long Lunch.

To attend TEDxAuckland 2017 and this years amazing Long Dinner buy your ticket from http://tedxauckland.com

Thanks to Ben Barton, Fluke Creative for the amazing Video! And all the amazing Partners and people that made this possible! NIWA New Zealand, Amano, Ortolana, Milse, The Produce Company, Scarecrow, Waiheke Herbs, Rangihoua Estate, Yealands Family Wines, Hallertau Brewery, Invivo Wines, Homestead, AUT - Auckland University of Technology and Auckland Tourism, Events and Economic Development (ATEED). And of course all the amazing TEDxAuckland Volunteers and Crew!

title: TEDxAuckland 2012: Ideas To Action, Highlights Compilation
description:
Music: Little Sines by Rhian Sheehan
Free download of the song here: https://soundcloud.com/loopcrew/rhian-sheehan-little-sines

http://www.tedxauckland.com/

About TEDx, x = independently organized event
In the spirit of ideas worth spreading, TEDx is a program of local, self-organized events that bring people together to share a TED-like experience. At a TEDx event, TEDTalks video and live speakers combine to spark deep discussion and connection in a small group. These local, self-organized events are branded TEDx, where x = independently organized TED event. The TED Conference provides general guidance for the TEDx program, but individual TEDx events are self-organized.* (*Subject to certain rules and regulations)

title: BabyX at TEDxAuckland 2013
description:
TEDxAuckland attendees were the first in the world to interact with Baby X - the brainchild of New Zealander Mark Sagar, the multi Academy Award winner (formerly Special Projects Supervisor at Weta Digital) and his Laboratory for Animate Technologies, has been working to develop artificial intelligence that creates its own expressions and emotions, and can think and react. BabyX is a co-production with Augusto (http://www.augusto.co.nz) and The Laboratory of Animate Technologies (http://www.abi.auckland.ac.nz/en/about/our-research/projects/animate-technologies.html).

http://tedxauckland.com

title: #AUTLounge at TEDx Auckland 2014
description:
AUT University set up the #AUTLounge at this year’s TEDx Auckland 2014 to bring speakers and audiences a little closer. Here’s a little glimpse of what happened.

For more information about the AUT Lounge see http://www.news.aut.ac.nz/news/2014/august/aut-brings-the-autlounge-to-tedxauckland

title: Baby X world showcase coming to TEDxAuckland 2013
description: The future of Artificial Intelligence...The Baby X showcase at TEDxAuckland will be a unique opportunity for TEDx attendees to interact with the installation, and the first time Baby X has been seen anywhere in the world. The showcase installation is the result of a collaboration between Augusto and Mark Sagar's laboratory for Animate technologies with the support of NZTE. :: www.tedxauckland.com
